channel.title: Musings on Emil Hagbarth
channel.description: Recent content in Musings on Emil Hagbarth

item.title: New Schedule!
item.description: So I read this Medium post about how you should get up really early in the morning and work very focused for about 5 ours before doing anything else. Well - I’m not gonna get up at 5am as the guy who wrote the post does. That’s just not me. But I am gonna get up at before 7am and make sure that I’m ready to work by that time. Why?
